amendment.description: To increase funding for rural decentralized water systems.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3200 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3200 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Booker to Amendment SA 3411. To increase funding for rural decentralized water systems.
